name: Don't touch my pup!
description:
A red  panda mother is protecting her baby. Is she able to keep up with the humans?

This is a game made by: Yannick Dirksz and Brian Voermans. For the game jam #Scorespace 17

We made all the assets and music ourselves except for the menu buttons (where ue4 standard). We hope you guys enjoy the game. A comment for feedback is always welcome.
